dmca.title: Google DMCA - Born-Again-Christian
dmca.body:
Thu, 05 Oct 2006 01:16:51 +0100

Please note: I'm an English missionary in Asia, and you already have my
hard copy signature on file in relation to previous DMCA notifications,
for example see ticket number: [#15532342]

Reply to: legal@born-again-christian.info
3rd. Oct 2006

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
USA

DMCA Complaint of Copyright Violation by Upword.org and Steve Caswell

I, Colin Melbourne, am the sole owner of the website
born-again-christian.info, which has had original copyright material
taken from it without permission and posted illegally on webpages listed
in Google.com. In addition to copyright infringement, our legitimate
copyright notice has been removed in violation of International
Copyright Law, and US Federal Law. Please remove all the infringing
pages from your index immediately, and kindly reply to:

legal@born-again-christian.info

Confirming your compliance with our request in accordance with DMCA
1998.

Here follow details of the infringement:

The infringing pages can be found in Google using the search terms:
upword.org The Charming Serpent

The following pages containing the infringing material are currently in
Google:

http://www.upword.org/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=c9f419df5cdd1d233ba95c661606d0af&topic=91;prev_next=next

http://www.upword.org/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=259a4d0db1c9e4606ab14a6b50012cb7&topic=91;prev_next=next

The following variant urls of the same illegal post may also appear in
Google, and need to be removed:

http://www.upword.org/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=259a4d0db1c9e4606ab14a6b50012cb7&topic=183.0

http://www.upword.org/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=259a4d0db1c9e4606ab14a6b50012cb7&topic=91;prev_next=next

http://www.upword.org/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=c9f419df5cdd1d233ba95c661606d0af&topic=91;prev_next=next

http://www.upword.org/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=259a4d0db1c9e4606ab14a6b50012cb7&action=printpage;topic=183.0

http://www.upword.org/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=259a4d0db1c9e4606ab14a6b50012cb7&topic=183.msg482#msg482

http://www.upword.org/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=259a4d0db1c9e4606ab14a6b50012cb7&topic=183.msg482#msg482

Infringer: Upword.org Steve Caswell postmaster@upword.org

The copyrighted work at issue is the original copyright text that
appears on our website here:

Halloween's Satanic Roots Exposed:
http://www.born-again-christian.info/christian.view.of.halloween.htm

Statutory Declaration:

I, Colin Melbourne, have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted
materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I declare*, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

*NOTE: I am a Christian missionary, God's Word specifically commands me
NOT to swear, just let your yes be yes. (Holy Bible, James 5:12; 'But
above all things, my brethren, swear not, neither by heaven, neither by
the earth, neither by any other oath: but let your yea be yea; and your
nay, nay; lest ye fall into condemnation.') Therefore I don't swear
anything, I simply declare the above to be true.

SIGNED: Colin Melbourne
DATE: 3rd. Oct 2006
